alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Baldwin and west central Escambia Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 725 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Molino, or 14 miles northeast of Robertsdale, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Baldwin and west central Escambia Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
